channel.title: Debugging on Stefanos Vardalos
channel.description: Recent content in Debugging on Stefanos Vardalos

item.title: You should have better logging now!
item.description: *I have no idea what is going on…* You should have better logging now! There is a part of software development that not all developers take very seriously. That part is proper logging and everyone who has lost countless hours during debugging knows exactly what I mean. Useful logs can provide the developer ( especially when someone has to debug/maintain someone else’s code ) with tremendous help when trying to understand what the code actually does.
